EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_LA Open House_Q415.1 week Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Pivotal Los Angeles Open House is next Tuesday 11/10
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We are sending you a friendly reminder that you are registered for Pivotal Los Angeles Open House. The open house will take place on Tuesday, November 10, 2015. Please see event details below:
Date: November 10, 2015 Time: 6:00PM - 9:00PM Location: Pivotal <https://www.google.com/maps/place/1333+2nd+St,+Santa+Monica,+CA+90401/@34.0157177,-118.4996616,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m2!3m1!1s0x80c2a4cff165ae37:0xb2e0f317bfeb9f0c>, 1333 2nd Street, Suite 200, Santa Monica, 90401
If you're in Santa Monica for the week of Nov 9 - 13, we invite you to join us for Tech Week LA where Pivotal will be hosting the following activities:
- Talk: The Real Meaning of Digital Transformation for Businesses Today, Siobhan McFeeney Date: Wednesday, November 11, 2015 Time: 12:00 - 1:30PM Location: Pivotal Office, 1333 2nd Street, Suite 200, Santa Monica, CA 90401 Register
- Film Screening and Q&A of Code: Debugging the Gender Gap Date: Wednesday, November 11, 2015 Time: 7:00 - 9:00PM Location: AMC Theater, 310 3rd St, Santa Monica, CA 90401 (Third Street Promenade) Register
- Talk: Leading into the Future: The Lean Startup Mindset, Janice Fraser Date:Thursday, November 12, 2015 Time: 3:10 - 3:45PM Location: 200 Santa Monica Pier, Launch Stage Register
- Talk: Making Design Matter, Tim McCoy Date: Friday, November 13, 2015 Time: 12:00 - 12:30PM Location: 200 Santa Monica Pier, Summit Stage Register <http://sched.co/4cEj>
{{my.Save The Date:default=edit me}}
We look forward to you joining us at the Pivotal Open House!
The Pivotal Team
Questions? Please contact us via email <mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://pivotal.io/news-events>.
